roleset.name: make contemporary, modernize
roleset.note: CONTEMPORIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'contemporize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from contemporize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: ``[The ad campaign]-1 is meant [*-1]to contemporize the thought of National Geographic,'' she says.
